verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let the living water flow o'er my soul
Let the Holy spirit come and take
control
In every situation that has come o'er
my mind
All my cares and trials unto you i
resign.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Father , Father ,Father
Jesus, Jesus, Jesus
Spirit, Spirit, Spirit

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come down Holy spirit and take
control
Hold me in your loving arms and
make me whole
Wipe away all doubts and fears and
take my pride
Hold me to your love and keep me
by your side

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Father , Father Father
Jesus, Jesus, Jesus
Spirit, Spirit, Spirit

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Give your life to Jesus, let him take
your soul
Let him take you in His arms and
make you whole
As you give your life to Him He'll
make you whole
You will live and reign with him eternally

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
Father , Father Father
Jesus, Jesus, Jesus
Spirit, Spirit, Spirit
